title: Add bottom-left profile settings button

requirements.text: Add a user-accessible "Profile Settings" button positioned in the bottom-left corner of the desktop UI that opens the existing User Settings overlay when clicked.

quotes: add profile settings button at the bottom left corner

acceptanceCriteria: On desktop layout, a settings button is visible in the bottom-left corner of the app UI (within the leftmost rail area).
Clicking the button sets the existing navigation state to open the User Settings overlay (the view rendered by UserSettingsShell via showUserSettings).
The button has an English tooltip/label (e.g., "User Settings" or "Profile Settings").
The button is keyboard accessible (reachable via Tab and activatable via Enter/Space).
Mobile behavior is not regressed (existing settings entry points in MobileTopBar/MobileShell continue to work).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Do not edit immutable hook/entry files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose them instead).
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for this UI-only feature.
nonGoals: Creating new user settings pages or changing existing settings functionality.
Changing server settings access points or channel navigation behavior.
